summary: A darkly humorous look at the lives and loves of four modern women, each with their own remarkable, intriguing and often tragic story.
cast: Rab Affleck|Mabel Aitken|Andrew Barr|Leigh Biagi|Tam Dean Burn|Juliet Cadzow|Daniel Cameron|Scott Cleverdon|Brendan Coyle|Kern Falconer|Michael Fassbender|Niall Greig Fulton|Michelle Gomez|Clare Grogan|Sean Harris|Sean Hay|Daniel Healy|Shirley Henderson|Paul Ireland|Miles Jupp|Peter Kelly|Shauna Macdonald|Lynne McCallum|Gary McCormack|Kathleen McDermott|Myra McFadyen|Scott McKay|Bob Morris|Jonny Owen|Stewart Porter|Ralph Riach|Graeme Rooney|Jamie Sives|Ali De Souza|Christina Strachan|Simon Tait|Kathryn Walker|Gail Watson|June Watson|Clare Welch|Tam White|Robert Willox|Douglas Bunn|John Edwards|Ryan Hendrick|Chanley Muir|Hannah Templeton-Cox
title: Wedding Belles
